alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 2:14PM PST until November 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills
